body_html:
@MohammadMoradi @WenguoLi @zhyj3038
Hello all,

I am facing the same problem when I am using inference_type=FLOAT. Do you guys solved the problem?
Where should I change the value for bytebuffer? I am not getting how should one allocate 4*270000 when using float buffer.

Please share your suggestion.

Thank you

body:
@MohammadMoradi @WenguoLi @zhyj3038 
Hello all,

I am facing the same problem when I am using `inference_type=FLOAT`. Do you guys solved the problem? 
Where should I change the value for bytebuffer? I am not getting how should one allocate 4*270000 when using float buffer. 

Please share your suggestion.

Thank you
